select seq_dditmember.nextval from dual
insert into dditmember( mem_no, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_postcode, mem_address1, mem_address2, mem_agree, mem_profileimg, mem_regdate ) values( #{memNo}, #{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memPostCode}, #{memAddress1}, #{memAddress2}, #{memAgree}, #{memProfileImg}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_postcode, mem_address1, mem_address2, mem_agree, mem_profileimg, mem_regdate from dditmember where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_pw = #{memPw}
select mem_id from dditmember where mem_email = #{memEmail} and mem_name = #{memName}
select mem_pw from dditmember where mem_email = #{memEmail} and mem_name = #{memName} and mem_id = #{memId}
